p.codeblock: virtual int setExternalVideoSource(bool enabled, bool useTexture, EXTERNAL_VIDEO_SOURCE_TYPE sourceType = VIDEO_FRAME, rtc::SenderOptions encodedVideoOption = rtc::SenderOptions()) = 0;

section.p: After enabling the external video source by calling this method, you can call to push external video data to the SDK.
section.note: Switching video sources dynamically is not supported in the channel. To switch from an external to an internal video source, you must leave the channel, call this method to disable the external video source, and then rejoin the channel.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Call this method before joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to use an external video source:
: Use an external video source, and the SDK will prepare to receive external video frames.
: (Default) Do not use an external video source.

Whether to use Texture format for external video frames:
: Use Texture format.
: (Default) Do not use Texture format.
Type of external video frame, whether it is encoded. See .
Video encoding options. Required only when sourceType is ENCODED_VIDEO_FRAME. Contact technical support to configure this parameter.
